introduction:
There isn't much here yet, but that will change.

Welcome to my website, which was created as part of a project during the retraining course Web Application Programming by ITnetwork s.r.o.

I learned here and am still improving my programming skills in JavaScript. I use the Node.js framework and the React library. For styling the presentation part of the website, I use Bootstrap. I have previously been introduced to the WordPress content management system and creating custom themes.

Besides programming, I enjoy going to nature and also exploring Czechoslovakian fortifications. One representative can be seen here in the picture :)
aboutRickAndMorty: web dedicated to the characters of the Rick and Morty show
aboutFamilyDatabase: form app for saving members, database with search and filter functions
